artist: Artist: Ayaoka Yūshin; Artist: Mochizuki Kinpō
creditline: Gift of funds from Mr. and Mrs. Samuel H. Maslon
inscription:
Notification:Witty poem contest will be held at Shingenji templem Iriya cho_ Shitaya, Nov. 12 Meiji 26, starting at 11:00 am
(3 poems listed as exapmles)
\"Submit your witty poems. Good poems will be posted in front of the temple\"
Judge:Saiwaido_ Tokuchi, Ochiai Yoshiiku, Minami Sho_ji
Entertainment Program:\"To_sei share musume\"(probably a comic story) by Yanagiya Jo_taro_, Hakurai share tejina(western magic show) by Shuntensai Ryu_ichi, Sandai shrego(probably a comic) by Ryu_tei Enshi
Fee:50 sen per person, drink and snack will be served
Contributors:(15 names listed)
Producers:(7 names listed)
Organizer:Ito_ senzo_
This notification calligraphed by Sotai(his seal)
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink and color on paper
title: Notification of the witty poem contest at Iriya, Tokyo
